item.description:
I hope everyone is having a warm, wonderful and happy, holiday season.  For our December Coffee Talk Holiday Meetup event, come join us to celebrate the holidays with your favorite coffee meetup group for coffee by the by the fireplace.  To celebrate the holidays, we'll meet at 4pm at the Starbucks in Orange, CT.

Happy Holidays to all of you!  Looking forward to catching up over coffee by the fireplace on Saturday, December 8th at the Starbucks in Orange, CT.  Please see below for directions.

http://www.forlocations.com/starbucks-Orange/CT/538-boston-post-rd

www.forlocations.com/starbucks-Orange/CT/538-boston-post-rd
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have a Purple Back Pack.
item.name: Coffee by the Fireplace at Starbucks in Orange, CT...Happy Holidays!!
